title: Prasthala
text: Prasthala was the capital of king Susharman of <a href="Trigarta%20Kingdom">Trigarta Kingdom</a>. As per epic <a href="Mahabharata">Mahabharata</a>, this city was under the constant attack of <a href="Matsya%20Kingdom">Matsya</a> kings like the king <a href="Virata">Virata</a>. Susharman tried to avenge the Matsyas with the help of <a href="Duryodhana">Duryodhana</a> of <a href="Hastinapura">Hastinapura</a>, but the attempt was foiled by the <a href="Pandavas">Pandavas</a> staying in the domains of the Matsyas. Prasthala is identified to be the modern city <a href="Jalandhar">Jalandhar</a> in <a href="Punjab%20%28India%29">Punjab</a>, <a href="India">India</a>.
